>
[Screech Shooter](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1169)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 155</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Built from the larynx of an [owlbear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=328), [terror shrike](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1335), or similar animal that possesses a frightening screech or similar special ability, a _screech shooter_ is a special _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [harmona gun](/Weapons.aspx?ID=202)_ designed to fire terrifying blasts of sound. A _screech shooter_ deals sonic damage but can otherwise be used like a normal harmona gun.

<document level="2" id="action-958" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include the larynx of a creature with a frightening screech.

A greater screech shooter is a _+2 greater striking harmona gun_. The DC for the activation is 30 and it affects creatures in a 40-foot emanation.
